name: Loksak aLOKSAK Element Proof Bag Multipack
description: Protect valuables, books, toiletries and electronics, by storing them in these durable, watertight storage bags with aLOKSAK's new double zip-closure.Made of durable 6mm polyethylene blended film that's similar to PVC of the same thickness, but with a lower cold-crack tolerance.Easy to use double zip-closures keep water, dust, and sand from harming your stuff.Soft-sided, they hold objects of all shapes and sizes.Certified waterproof to 60m.Set includes 4 bags: 10 x 18cm, 15 x 15cm,  23 x 15cm,  and 30 x 30cm.
